utils

Class Option

  • java.lang.Object
    • utils.Option

  • public class Option
extends java.lang.Object
    One option. An option consists of: 1. An option string. The option is activated by a string of the form "-option" in the command line arguments. 2a. A flag indicating whether the option takes an argument. 2b. The name of the argument if any. 2c. The type of the argument if any. 2d. The default value for the argument. 3. A description of the option.
